A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm so deeply disappointed in this movie! As a long-time Star Wars fan\, I was so much looking forward to a new installment just to find this... :-( . 

The visual and sound effects are as sharp as ever and really beautiful but watch and hear.

The story\, the unnecessary scenes and the mostly ridiculous humor unfortunately destroys the entire movie though. 

Seriously\, the movie has so many issues that I actively do not want to see it ever again! After episode 7 this one feels completely off and weird.

Episodes 1-3 are probably still worse\, but episode 8 is very close when it comes to the bad taste it left in my mouth.
What a shame...
